name: Pass an inference unit with sub models with within-bounds precision

steps.name: And evaluation criteria for multilabel classification sub model genre-prediction with precision gt 0.2 for class Action
And evaluation criteria for multiclass classification sub model brightness-prediction with recall gt 0.2
And metrics computed from the inference results
When we apply evaluation criteria to the computed metrics
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed

fullName: I want to apply custom evaluation criteria to metrics computed from sub models of the inference unit: Pass an inference unit with sub models with within-bounds precision
